casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joe Robert REYNOLDS 155P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 19, 2017 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Southern Pines, for Reynolds, Joe Robert. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of May 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of May 2017."
